DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate hair reduction in the underarms in patients treated with the miraDry System.
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study of Axillary Hair Loss in Patients Treated With the miraDry System
DOC.detailed_description: This study is designed to quantify the amount of hair reduction in patients treated with the miraDry System in the axilla. Hair counts will be assessed before and after treatments including at follow up visits.
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age Visible underarm hair (prefer light colored hair; blonde, red, gray) Secondary Axillary Hyperhidrosis Prior surgery and/or Botox Injections in axillae Pacemaker or requires supplemental oxygen Pregnant
